question: United States President Donald Trump awarded a Medal of Honor to whom?
explanation: United States President Donald Trump awarded a Medal of Honor to retired Master Chief Special Warfare Operator Britt K. Slabinski, at the White House, United States. Britt K. Slabinski is a former member of the Navy's SEAL Team Six. He was awarded for leading a rescue mission on a mountaintop in Afghanistan in 2002. He retired from the Navy in 2014 after completing more than 25 years of service.
